summary: Hot wallets associated with the crypto exchange CoinEx appeared to have been drained of cryptocurrency on Tuesday.
title: CoinEx hot wallets appear to be drained of nearly $28 million in crypto
content: Crypto exchange CoinEx appeared to be suffering an exploit Tuesday that drained four of hot wallets of nearly $28 million in cryptocurrency, according to on chain data
"Hi @coinexcom, suspicious outflow of large funds from #coinex hot wallets," blockchain security firm PeckShield wrote on X.
The drain appears to be ongoing. CoinEx did not immediately respond to The Block's request for comment.
